Sentencas: Because of their high efficiency and very low emissions, fuel cells have been one of the choice areas of research in current energy development.
Titulo: Design and Performance Study of a Solid Oxide Fuel Cell and Gas Turbine Hybrid System Applied in Combined Cooling, Heating, and Power System

Sentencas: The solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) is a type of high-temperature fuel cell.
Titulo: Design and Performance Study of a Solid Oxide Fuel Cell and Gas Turbine Hybrid System Applied in Combined Cooling, Heating, and Power System

Sentencas: It has the characteristic of a very high operating temperature of 1,027 degrees C (1,300 K).
Titulo: Design and Performance Study of a Solid Oxide Fuel Cell and Gas Turbine Hybrid System Applied in Combined Cooling, Heating, and Power System

Sentencas: The SOFC has the main advantage of very high performance efficiency (more than 50%) but also has very high exhaust temperatures.
Titulo: Design and Performance Study of a Solid Oxide Fuel Cell and Gas Turbine Hybrid System Applied in Combined Cooling, Heating, and Power System

Sentencas: Current studies point out that the combination of the SOFC and gas turbine (GT) can produce efficiency of more than 60%.
Titulo: Design and Performance Study of a Solid Oxide Fuel Cell and Gas Turbine Hybrid System Applied in Combined Cooling, Heating, and Power System

Sentencas: The exhaust temperature of this hybrid power system can be as high as 227-327 degrees C (500-600 K).
Titulo: Design and Performance Study of a Solid Oxide Fuel Cell and Gas Turbine Hybrid System Applied in Combined Cooling, Heating, and Power System

Sentencas: With this waste heat utilized, it is possible to further improve the overall efficiency of the system.
Titulo: Design and Performance Study of a Solid Oxide Fuel Cell and Gas Turbine Hybrid System Applied in Combined Cooling, Heating, and Power System

Sentencas: A simulation program of the SOFC/GT system and the introduction of the concept of combined cooling, heating, and power (CCHP) system have been used in this study.
Titulo: Design and Performance Study of a Solid Oxide Fuel Cell and Gas Turbine Hybrid System Applied in Combined Cooling, Heating, and Power System

Sentencas: The waste heat of the SOFC/GT hybrid power generation system was used as the heat source to drive an absorption refrigeration system (ARS) for cooling.
Titulo: Design and Performance Study of a Solid Oxide Fuel Cell and Gas Turbine Hybrid System Applied in Combined Cooling, Heating, and Power System

Sentencas: This waste heat enables the SOFC/GT to generate electricity in the system while providing additional cooling and heating capacity.
Titulo: Design and Performance Study of a Solid Oxide Fuel Cell and Gas Turbine Hybrid System Applied in Combined Cooling, Heating, and Power System

Sentencas: Therefore, the authors have a combined CCHP system developed using three major modules-the SOFC, GT, and ARS modules.
Titulo: Design and Performance Study of a Solid Oxide Fuel Cell and Gas Turbine Hybrid System Applied in Combined Cooling, Heating, and Power System

Sentencas: The SOFC module was verified by the authors' test data.
Titulo: Design and Performance Study of a Solid Oxide Fuel Cell and Gas Turbine Hybrid System Applied in Combined Cooling, Heating, and Power System

Sentencas: The GT and SOFC/GT modules were compared with a commercial code and literature data.
Titulo: Design and Performance Study of a Solid Oxide Fuel Cell and Gas Turbine Hybrid System Applied in Combined Cooling, Heating, and Power System

Sentencas: Both the single-and double-effect ARS modules were verified with available literature results.
Titulo: Design and Performance Study of a Solid Oxide Fuel Cell and Gas Turbine Hybrid System Applied in Combined Cooling, Heating, and Power System

Sentencas: Finally, the CCHP analysis simulation system, which combines SOFC, GT, and ARS, has been completed.
Titulo: Design and Performance Study of a Solid Oxide Fuel Cell and Gas Turbine Hybrid System Applied in Combined Cooling, Heating, and Power System

Sentencas: With this CCHP configuration system, the fuel usability of the system by the authors' definition could be more than 100%, especially for the double-effect ARS.
Titulo: Design and Performance Study of a Solid Oxide Fuel Cell and Gas Turbine Hybrid System Applied in Combined Cooling, Heating, and Power System

Sentencas: This analysis system was demonstrated to be a useful tool for future CCHP designs with SOFC/GT systems.
Titulo: Design and Performance Study of a Solid Oxide Fuel Cell and Gas Turbine Hybrid System Applied in Combined Cooling, Heating, and Power System
